channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: US cargo tech company publicly exposed its shipping systems and customer data to the web
item.description: Shipping tech company Bluspark left internal plaintext passwords, including those of executives, exposed to the internet, at a time when hacks in the ...

item.title: How AI Companies Got Caught Up in US Military Efforts
item.description: Two years ago, companies like Meta and OpenAI were united against military use of their tools. Now all of that has changed.

item.title: The Merach Vibration Plate Is the Funniest Workout I've Ever Done
item.description: It turns out that this TikTok-viral vibration plate may have some surprising health benefits.

item.title: 15 Best Office Chairs of 2026— I’ve Tested 65 to Pick Them
item.description: Sitting at a desk for hours? Upgrade your WFH setup and work in style with these comfy WIRED-tested seats.

item.title: In Photos: One Week Since the Shooting of Renee Nicole Good in Minneapolis
item.description: Protests across Minnesota—and around the country—are ongoing, as residents demonstrate against their federal government.

item.title: AI security firm, depthfirst, announces $40 million series A
item.description: The company used an AI-native platform to help companies fight threats.

item.title: WIRED Tested Dozens of Blenders. These Are Our 8 Favorites (2026)
item.description: The perfect kitchen companions, these versatile blenders can whip up breakfasts, dips, milkshakes, cocktails, and everything in between.

item.title: Tesla will only offer subscriptions for Full Self-Driving (Supervised) going forward
item.description: It's a huge change to Tesla's approach with FSD, and it could impact Musk's $1T pay package and the company's myriad legal troubles.

item.title: YouTube now has a way for parents to block kids from watching Shorts
item.description: Parents will be able to toggle the Shorts time limit on connected children's accounts.

item.title: Gemini’s new beta feature provides proactive responses based on your photos, emails, and more
item.description: Personal Intelligence is off by default, as users have the option to choose if and when they want to connect their Google apps to Gemini.
